JJ

Good day guys! I'm JJ and I have been a Japanese language student here in Tokyo and I'm about to start a new job starting this month.

I'm from the Philippines and had obtained my teacher's licence there before moving to Japan two years ago. I love teaching and having conversations with new people and I look forward to meeting you all on the 9th! ğŸ™Œ Let's hang out and chill!
